name: Mermaid's Couplet
outcome: {attackerName} quickly sings a bewitching magical couplet, making {targetName}'s heart flutter with fascination!
miss: {attackerName} quickly sings a bewitching magical couplet but {targetName} manages to cover {targetHisOrHer} ears in time!
statusOutcome: {targetName} can't shake off their sudden need for {attackerName}! {targetName} has been charmed!
statusMiss: {targetName} manages to resist the bewitching song's magic!
